description: To facilitate the upgrade to Windows 11, version 23H2, deploy the enablement package KB-5027397. This package allows the full upgrade from Windows 11 versions 21H2 and 22H2 with the necessary files for installation via the Unified Update Platform (UUP). Ensure that both x64 and ARM64 architectures are addressed by the respective updates. The deployment will follow the standard update protocols in WSUS for proper integration. This operation will enhance system readiness with the latest features and security improvements inherent in version 23H2.
